name: Reconnaissance - Gather Victim Identity Information (T1589)
description: Detects attempts to gather victim identity information via PowerShell or command line utilities. This activity is often part of the reconnaissance phase before privilege escalation or lateral movement.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.name:(powershell.exe OR cmd.exe) AND (process.args:(*whoami* OR *net user* OR *net group* OR *net localgroup* OR *Get-ADUser* OR *Get-ADGroupMember* OR *Get-LocalUser* OR *Win32_UserAccount*))
